name: Xander's Dungeon
description:
This game is an attempt to make streamlined and user-friendly version of dungeon crawler, which would still be interesting and challenging to play. As in many similar games, players should find their way through the dungeon, while fighting monsters, collecting items, learning new skills and improving abilities.

Game includes 3 dungeon levels, 19 enemy types, more than 50 items, 40 different skills and 20 different spells. 

Additional site link: https://xanders-dungeon.herokuapp.com/
